item.dc:creator: @telekinetic telekinetic
item.description:
@telekinetic wrote:

in my quest list there are those command where u click on and the items comes in ur inv…or exp…

so i want t make this for mods+ i tried alot of stuff…but nothing seems to work…can somone give me the code i need please thnx here is my code…so just qoute it and insert the code:
